synopsis.text:
Sakuraba residence, a hub of vibrancy and youth, continues to bustle with energy two years after Aoi and Kaoru's fateful meeting at the railway station. As Kaoru transitions into his post-graduate life, assisting his professor, he remains entwined in a secret romance with Aoi. Meanwhile, their unconventional household, filled with eccentric characters, adds a myriad of challenges and color to their lives.

Chika, the vivacious schoolgirl, injects an extra dose of liveliness into the residence with her candid questions, while Tina grapples with the impending sadness of returning to the US. Mayu's unrequited love for Kaoru, Taeko's endearing clumsiness, and Miyabi's iron-fisted rule further complicate matters, leaving Kaoru to navigate this emotional labyrinth.

As time marches on, changes loom on the horizon, testing the strength of Kaoru and Aoi's bond amidst the whirlwind of their shared life. Will Kaoru manage to balance his loyalties and the needs of his friends, all while nurturing his love for Aoi? Only time will reveal the fate of their relationship in this lively, heartwarming tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
